title: The City of Wilmington picks up several different types of recyclable items in my neighborhood, but does not pick up shredded paper in clear plastic bags. I wonder why the City does not pick up shredded paper and wonder if there are any alternate ways for me to recycle shredded paper? I shred a fairly substantial amount of paper in my paper shredding machine and I hate to just throw the paper out in the trash.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=19304
